size.description: Enter the size of the field

allow-clear.description: Whether to allow the input field to be cleared

error.description: Whether it is in an error state

:max-length.description: The maximum length of the input value, the errorOnly property was added in version 2.12.0
:max-length.description_zh: 输入值的最大长度，errorOnly 属性在 2.12.0 版本添加

show-word-limit.description: Whether or not to display the word count

:word-slice.description: The character truncation method, which is used with wordLength
:word-slice.description_zh: 字符截取方法，同 wordLength 一起使用

:input-attrs.description: The property of the internal input element
:input-attrs.description_zh: 内部 input 元素的属性

search-button.description: Whether it is a rear button mode

loading.description: Whether it is in the Loading state

button-text.description: The text of the search button replaces the original icon when used
button-text.description_zh: 搜索按钮的文字，使用后会替换原本的图标

:button-props.description: Search for the properties of the button

methods.name: focus
methods.description: Makes the input box get focus

methods.name: blur
methods.description: Makes the input box lose focus

events.name: change
events.description: Triggers only when the input box is out of focus or when press enter
events.description_zh: 仅在输入框失焦或按下回车时触发

events.name: press-enter
events.description: Triggered when the user presses enter

events.name: clear
events.description: Triggered when the user clicks the clear button
events.description_zh: 用户点击清除按钮时触发

events.name: focus
events.description: Triggered when the input box gets focus
events.description_zh: 输入框获取焦点时触发

events.name: blur
events.description: Triggered when the input box loses focus
events.description_zh: 输入框失去焦点时触发

events.name: search
events.description: Triggered when the search button is clicked
